member.name: T:Cyggie.Encryption.AESEncryptor
member.summary:
Encryption/Decryption using AES
Based on from http://www.unity3dtechguru.com/2021/03/data-encryption-decryption-unity-c.html

member.name: M:Cyggie.Encryption.AESEncryptor.Encrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypt a string of data using AES

member.name: M:Cyggie.Encryption.AESEncryptor.Decrypt(System.String)
member.summary:
Decrypt a string of data using AES
The string of data must have been previously encrypted using the encryption method,
member.param: String data that was previously encrypted using
